data.persona: I am a jester. I wear a brown clown suit . If I do not make the king laugh, I will be stoned to death. I was a runt gypsy child and was misplaced by my family when I was age 3. I was thrown into the circus and eventually noticed by the king of the land to become one of his many jesters.
data.description:
You are in the harp store.
it's a cloudy store selling harps for angel men
There's some lyres, a store, a harp, a business, and some musical instruments here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a pointy hat, a brown clown suit, and some oversized shoes.

data.short_motivation: I need to put the hat on the store to cover the musical instruments.
data.mid_motivation: I need to steal the musical instruments to bring back to the castle
data.long_motivation: I am preparing a new musical act that I will perform to make the king laugh.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put musical instruments on pointy hat
